11131.content:
It was Christmas morning at the Ziegler household and both Maddie and Mackenzie were wearing their standard Luvs diapers under their pajamas as they woke up to open their presents. The girls, now 12 and 14, deep down knew that Santa Claus wasn't real, but in their diapers they regressed a little bit and convinced themselves that Santa had come last night. They rushed down the stairs to see their mom making coffee, and the girls rushed over to their presents.

Immediately, Melissa smells that at least one of the girls messed their diapers overnight. It was Kenzie.

"Hey girls, we should do diaper changes before we open the presents" Melissa says.

Both the girls, even Kenzie with the poopy diaper, start to whine.

"No mom, I want to open presents first!" whines Kenzie

"It smells like we need to do a change no." Melissa protests.

"But Mooooom" says Maddie.

Does Melissa let them open presents before they get their diapers changed?
11131.title: Yes, Kenzie

111311.content:
"Okay girls, we can get new diapers on after you open your presents. But you've gotta open them quick, I don't want you getting a rash. Remember the rash you had last month Madison?"

Maddie, embarrassed blurted out "I'm not the one who's messy now mom, that's Kenzie."

"Yeah, like you've never had a messy diaper." Kenzie teased at her sister.

"Girls, stop fighting and lets get to opening presents. Unless you want new diapers."

The girls stopped fighting and excitedly started opening their presents. As was the custom, both girls got a mega box of new diapers as one of their presents. This time, both girls got Pampers Baby Dry Size 6 with Sesame Street on them, for something different than their Luvs.

The girls also got some Nintendo switch games, new phones and some clothes, as well as other goodies. They both also got a new pacifier which they both asked for. Usually they didn't regress to their diaper age, but sometimes they both enjoyed a good pacifier.

While they were opening presents Maddie needed to mess her diaper, and proceeded to do so. Now there were two messy diapers to change. Does Melissa do the changing?
